entity.name: node
entity.query:
SELECT #Identifiers DISTINCT(finds.id) as id, CONCAT('finds-',finds.id) AS findIdentifier, finds.old_findID, finds.secuid, #geo metadata findspots.county, findspots.district, findspots.parish, findspots.knownas, osRegions.label as regionName, findspots.gridref, findspots.fourFigure, findspots.geohash, findspots.declat AS latitude, findspots.declong AS longitude, findspots.easting, findspots.northing, findspots.elevation, findspots.fourFigureLat, findspots.fourFigureLon, findspots.gridlen AS 'precision', findspots.accuracy, maporigins.term AS gridSource, CONCAT(declat,',',declong) AS coordinates,
#object metadata finds.institution, finds.objecttype, finds.notes, finds.description, finds.smr_ref AS smrRef, finds.other_ref AS otherRef, finds.culture, cultures.term AS cultureName, cultures.bmCultureID, finds.inscription, finds.classification, finds.subclass As subClassification, finds.treasureID AS TID, finds.treasure, finds.secwfstage AS workflow, finds.material1 AS material, mat.term AS materialTerm, mat.bmID AS primaryMaterialBM, finds.material2 AS secondaryMaterial, mat2.term AS secondaryMaterialTerm, mat2.bmID AS secondaryMaterialBM, finds.curr_loc AS currentLocation, finds.musaccno, finds.rally, finds.rallyID,rallies.rally_name AS rallyName, finds.decstyle, decstyles.term AS decstyleTerm, finds.manmethod AS manufacture, manufactures.term AS manufactureTerm, manufactures.bmID AS bmManufacture, surftreatments.term AS treatment, surftreatments.bmID AS bmTreatment, finds.surftreat AS treatment, finds.preservation, preservations.term AS preservationTerm, preservations.bmID AS bmPreservation, finds.discmethod as discovery, discmethods.method AS discoveryMethod, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM datefound1) AS discovered, finds.subs_action as subsequentAction, subsequentActions.action as subsequentActionTerm, finds.completeness, completeness.term AS completenessTerm, finds.findofnote AS note, findofnotereasons.term as reasonTerm, finds.findofnotereason AS reason, finds.width, finds.height, finds.thickness, finds.diameter, finds.weight, finds.length, finds.quantity, finds.hoard, finds.hoardID as hoardID, hoards.term AS hoardName,
#Chronology finds.broadperiod, finds.objdate1period AS periodFrom, p1.term AS periodFromName, finds.objdate2period AS periodTo, p2.term AS periodToName, finds.numdate1 AS fromdate, finds.numdate2 AS todate, finds.objdate1subperiod AS fromsubperiod, finds.objdate2subperiod AS tosubperiod, finds.datefound1, finds.datefound2, dq1.term as fromDateQualifier, dq2.term as toDateQualifier, sub1.term AS subperiodFrom, sub2.term AS subperiodTo,
#Admin metadata finds.createdBy AS createdBy, users.fullname AS creator, finds.created, finds.updated, finds.updatedBy, users2.fullname AS updater, finds.dbpediaSlug,
#Numismatic metadata coins.ruler_id AS ruler, coins.ruler2_id AS ruler2, rulers.issuer AS rulerName, r2.issuer AS secondaryRulerName, coins.denomination, denominations.denomination AS denominationName, coins.mint_id AS mint, mints.mint_name AS mintName, coins.obverse_description AS obverseDescription, coins.obverse_inscription AS obverseLegend, coins.reverse_description AS reverseDescription, coins.reverse_inscription AS reverseLegend, reverse_mintmark AS mintmark, coins.cciNumber, coins.allen_type AS allenType, coins.mack_type AS mackType, coins.bmc_type AS bmcType, coins.rudd_type AS abcType, coins.va_type AS vaType, coins.reeceID AS reeceID, coins.moneyer, moneyers.name AS moneyerName, coins.tribe, ironagetribes.tribe AS tribeName, ironagetribes.bmTribeID, coins.categoryID as category, medievalcategories.category AS categoryTerm, coins.typeID as type, medievaltypes.type AS typeTerm, coins.die_axis_measurement AS axis, coins.revtypeID as reverse, revtypes.type AS reverseType, coins.status, statuses.term AS statusTerm, CONCAT(geographyironage.region,' ',geographyironage.area) AS geography, coins.geographyID,
#Image metadata slides.imageID AS thumbnail, slides.filename, users.imagedir, licenseType.url AS imageCopyright,
#Personal metadata finds.finderID, finds.recorderID, finds.identifier1ID AS identifierID, finds.identifier2ID, finders.fullname AS finder, primaries.fullname AS identifier, secondaries.fullname AS secondaryIdentifier, recorders.fullname AS recorder,
#Numismatics LOD rulers.nomismaID AS rulerNomisma, rulers.dbpedia AS rulerDbpedia, rulers.viaf as rulerViaf, rulers.bmID as rulerBM, moneyers.dbpediaID AS moneyerDbpedia, moneyers.viaf AS moneyerViaf, moneyers.bmID AS moneyerBM, mints.nomismaID AS nomismaMintID, mints.woeid as mintWoeid, mints.geonamesID as mintGeonamesID, mints.bmID AS mintBM, mints.pleiadesID, denominations.nomismaID as nomismaDenominationID, denominations.bmID as denominationBM, denominations.dbpediaID AS denominationDbpedia,
#period LOD p1.ehTerm AS periodFromEH, p2.term AS periodToEH,p3.ehTerm as broadperiodEH, p1.bmID AS periodFromBM, p2.bmID AS periodToBM, p3.bmID as broadperiodBM,
#geo lod findspots.countyID, findspots.districtID, findspots.parishID, findspots.woeid, findspots.regionID,osCounties.type as countyType, osParishes.type as parishType, osDistricts.type as districtType, findspots.geonamesID
FROM finds LEFT JOIN findspots ON finds.secuid = findspots.findID LEFT JOIN coins ON finds.secuid = coins.findID LEFT JOIN moneyers ON coins.moneyer = moneyers.id LEFT JOIN findofnotereasons ON finds.findofnotereason = findofnotereasons.id LEFT JOIN users ON users.id = finds.createdBy LEFT JOIN users AS users2 ON users2.id = finds.updatedBy LEFT JOIN materials AS mat ON finds.material1 = mat.id LEFT JOIN materials AS mat2 ON finds.material2 = mat2.id LEFT JOIN decmethods ON finds.decmethod = decmethods.id LEFT JOIN decstyles ON finds.decstyle = decstyles.id LEFT JOIN manufactures ON finds.manmethod = manufactures.id LEFT JOIN surftreatments ON finds.surftreat = surftreatments.id LEFT JOIN completeness ON finds.completeness = completeness.id LEFT JOIN preservations ON finds.preservation = preservations.id LEFT JOIN periods AS p1 ON finds.objdate1period = p1.id LEFT JOIN periods AS p2 ON finds.objdate2period = p2.id LEFT JOIN periods AS p3 ON finds.broadperiod = p3.term LEFT JOIN subperiods AS sub1 ON finds.objdate1subperiod = sub1.id LEFT JOIN subperiods AS sub2 ON finds.objdate2subperiod = sub2.id LEFT JOIN cultures ON finds.culture = cultures.id LEFT JOIN discmethods ON discmethods.id = finds.discmethod LEFT JOIN denominations ON denominations.id = coins.denomination LEFT JOIN rulers ON rulers.id = coins.ruler_id LEFT JOIN rulers AS r2 ON r2.id = coins.ruler2_id LEFT JOIN reeceperiods ON coins.reeceID = reeceperiods.id LEFT JOIN mints ON mints.id = coins.mint_id LEFT JOIN finds_images ON finds_images.find_id = finds.secuid LEFT JOIN slides ON finds_images.image_id = slides.secuid LEFT JOIN workflowstages ON finds.secwfstage = workflowstages.id LEFT JOIN rallies ON finds.rallyID = rallies.id LEFT JOIN ironagetribes ON coins.tribe = ironagetribes.id LEFT JOIN medievalcategories ON medievalcategories.id = coins.categoryID LEFT JOIN medievaltypes ON medievaltypes.id = coins.typeID LEFT JOIN geographyironage ON geographyironage.id = coins.geographyID LEFT JOIN hoards ON finds.hoardID = hoards.id LEFT JOIN subsequentActions ON finds.subs_action = subsequentActions.id LEFT JOIN revtypes ON coins.revtypeID = revtypes.id LEFT JOIN people AS finders ON finds.finderID = finders.secuid LEFT JOIN people AS primaries ON finds.identifier1ID = primaries.secuid LEFT JOIN people AS secondaries ON finds.identifier2ID = secondaries.secuid LEFT JOIN people AS recorders ON finds.recorderID = recorders.secuid LEFT JOIN maporigins ON maporigins.id = findspots.gridrefsrc LEFT JOIN osParishes ON findspots.parishID = osParishes.osID LEFT JOIN osDistricts ON findspots.districtID = osDistricts.osID LEFT JOIN osCounties ON findspots.countyID = osCounties.osID LEFT JOIN osRegions ON findspots.regionID = osCounties.osID LEFT JOIN datequalifiers AS dq1 ON dq1.id = finds.objdate1cert LEFT JOIN datequalifiers AS dq2 ON dq2.id = finds.objdate1cert LEFT JOIN statuses ON coins.status = statuses.id LEFT JOIN licenseType ON slides.ccLicense = licenseType.id
